channel.title: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!
channel.description: okay the game is called Advanced Curveball. I just need a script that can follow the ball with the paddle. I won't use this script for evil, I just need to teach I cheater a lesson.

item.title: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

[code]program CurveBall;

// http://forums.krazyletter.com/index.php?act=Arcade&do=play&gameid=135
// F2 to stop script
// you must push play yourself, it will do the rest
// by Rune Hacker

const //no need to edit these
BallColor = 16777215;
RedBall = 9408511;
Score = 12566272;
BallStart1 = 16777215;
BallStart2 = 9699240;

var
x,y:integer;

begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor,39,41,511,357))then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
end;
if(FindColor(x,y, BallStart1,281, 189, 283, 191))and
(FindColor(x, y, BallStart2,261, 205, 263, 207))then
begin
Wait(1500);
MoveMouse(265, 198);
Wait(500);
ClickMouse(265, 198, true);
end;
if(not FindColor(x,y,RedBall,104, 72,160, 83))and
(not FindColor(x,y,Score,82, 53,137, 60))then
begin
Wait(4000);
MoveMouse(265, 198);
Wait(500);
ClickMouse(265, 198, true);
end;
until(IsFKeyDown(2));
end.[/code]

Try this and tell me what you think, works great for me.
And how does the rep system work, ive been wondering how lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!

item.title: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!
item.dc:creator: @kingprotos kingprotos
item.description:
@kingprotos wrote:

[quote=“maicrodrop, post:15, topic:61438”]Ok, well, slight improvement on Gokons improvement. I simply shrank the area that SCAR scans for the ball to only the area where, when the mouse moves there, the balls path would be blocked. It gave a 5k improvement over my best human score, and a 7k improvement over the Gokon’s version. Note however that it wasn’t a very scientific test, so… Also, I’m working on another version, using this as a base to get me back into SCAR scripting. I’ll post it when it’s done X)

[code]program New; // Coded by yakman, edited by gokon, then a slight mod by maicrodrop

{Only set BallColor if it doesnt work
Press F2 to stop
You have to Click to start yourself}

const
BallColor = 11796418; //the ball color, only set if it doesnt work
WaitTime = 0; //this should be as small as possible
//but too small and it will lag your computer
BallColor2 = 5111663; //the ball color, when it is outside the
//edge of the paddle

var
x,y:integer;

begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor,109,90,445,320))then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(10) // to allow for slightly more accurate mouse movement
end;
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor2,109,90,445,320))then //this is for saving yourself
//if the ball has escaped the edge of the
//paddle
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
end;
until(IsFKeyDown(2));
end.[/code][/quote]

when I press play on the skript it doesnt do anything =\

Read full topic
item.source: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!

item.title: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!
item.dc:creator: @maicrodrop maicrodrop
item.description:
@maicrodrop wrote:

Ok, well, slight improvement on Gokons improvement. I simply shrank the area that SCAR scans for the ball to only the area where, when the mouse moves there, the balls path would be blocked. It gave a 5k improvement over my best human score, and a 7k improvement over the Gokon’s version. Note however that it wasn’t a very scientific test, so… Also, I’m working on another version, using this as a base to get me back into SCAR scripting. I’ll post it when it’s done X)

[code]program New; // Coded by yakman, edited by gokon, then a slight mod by maicrodrop

{Only set BallColor if it doesnt work
Press F2 to stop
You have to Click to start yourself}

const
BallColor = 11796418; //the ball color, only set if it doesnt work
WaitTime = 0; //this should be as small as possible
//but too small and it will lag your computer
BallColor2 = 5111663; //the ball color, when it is outside the
//edge of the paddle

var
x,y:integer;

begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor,109,90,445,320))then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(10) // to allow for slightly more accurate mouse movement
end;
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor2,109,90,445,320))then //this is for saving yourself
//if the ball has escaped the edge of the
//paddle
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
end;
until(IsFKeyDown(2));
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Okay need a script for this game. should be REALLY EASY!
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

this is kinda random but… without a script my first time playing i got 18k points. i dont know if this is actually good or not.
heres a screenie of my second try:

i didnt get a chance to get a screenie of my third try, cause it automatically redirects u to the high scores, but i got 24k points without a script.
You know, i think its possible that Pharon isnt cheating at this game. he just has no life.

yakman, i edited your script, and it got me 4k more points. not much, i know, but i was about 500 points away from being on the highscore list.

[code]program New; // Coded by yakman, edited by gokon

{Only set BallColor if it doesnt work
Press F2 to stop
You have to Click to start yourself}

const
BallColor = 11796418; //the ball color, only set if it doesnt work
WaitTime = 0; //this should be as small as possible
//but too small and it will lag your computer
BallColor2 = 5111663; //the ball color, when it is outside the
//edge of the paddle
var
x,y:integer;

begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor,39,44,509,354))then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(10) // to allow for slightly more accurate mouse movement
end;
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor2,39,44,509,354))then //this is for saving yourself
//if the ball has escaped the edge of the
//paddle
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
end;
until(IsFKeyDown(2));
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

this works, but it doesnt make you invincible, when the curves get really high, around level 7 it dies

[code]
program New;

{Only set BallColor if it doesnt work
Press F2 to stop
You have to Click to start yourself}

const
BallColor = 11796418; //the ball color, only set if it doesnt work
WaitTime = 0; //this should be as small as possible
//but too small and it will lag your computer
var
x,y:integer;

begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,BallColor,39,44,509,354))then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
end
until(IsFKeyDown(2));
end.[/code]
any chance of some rep? get someone who can do it

edit: hey Ron, i didnt know you looked at this section ;D its the straight and narrow for me now, or until i find someplace that mods dont look
